downloadDescription: Microsoft Office Accounting Language Packs for 2009 are designed to meet the needs of multilingual small businesses. Language Packs, can be installed onto any edition of the US version of Office Accounting 2009.
detailsSection:
Bilingual capability at your fingertips

Microsoft Office Accounting Language Packs for 2009 are designed to meet the needs of multilingual small businesses. Language Packs, can be installed onto any edition of the US version of Office Accounting 2009.

You will have the ability to customize your Office Accounting experience and to easily switch between your base language and your installed languages for your:
  • User Interface
  • Offline Help
The language preference located on the general tab in the programs preference dialog allows each user to select the desired language.

What that means for small businesses is increased productivity, collaboration, and effectiveness among your multilingual workers.
systemRequirementsSection:
• This download works with the following programs:
    • Microsoft Office Accounting 2009
    • Microsoft Office Word 2002 or later is required to create customized invoices, sales orders, quotes, customer credit memos, customer statements, and purchase orders
    • Microsoft Internet Explorer® 6 or later, 32-bit browser only
  • The following is also required:
    • 1 GHz or faster processor
    • 512 MB of RAM or more
    • 300 MB of available hard-disk space; a portion of this disk space will be freed after installation if the original download package is removed from the hard drive
    • 1024 x 768 or higher-resolution monitor
    • Internet functionality requires Internet access (fees may apply)
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Download the file by clicking the Download button for the locale that you want and saving the file to your hard disk.
    • United States (English): MOA2009LangPack.msi
  2. On your hard disk, double-click the file that you downloaded in step 1 to start the Setup program.
  3. Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the installation.
Instructions for use:

After you install this program, on the taskbar, click the Start button, click All Programs, click Microsoft Office, and then click Microsoft Office Accounting 2009. You can change the language setting located on the general tab in the programs preference dialog.


To uninstall this download:

  1. On the Start menu click Control Panel.
    • In Windows XP, double-click Add/Remove Programs.
    • In Windows Vista, double-click Programs and Features.
  3. In the list of currently installed programs, select Microsoft Office Accounting 2009 Spanish Language Pack and then click Remove or Add/Remove. If a dialog box appears, follow the instructions to remove the program.
  4. Click Yes or OK to confirm that you want to remove the program.
